w:HTMLPanel.title: PWT - Roadmap - Coming soon on PWT

w:Header.w:Heading: Coming soon...
w:Header.p: PWT is not over. Some good stuff is in the pipe.
The version 1.1.0 has been released with a lot of new amazing stuff (Injection framework and others...)! See the release notes.

w:HTMLPanel.p: We're still working on new features and improvements, but we think and we know that today, PWT can help you to build powerful applications easily.
If you think something is missing, don't hesitate to tell us ! We did build PWT to simplify our work, but yours too !!

ul.li: Join the community on Google Group
Talk, blog and tweet about PWT. Spread the word!
Why not try and use it on your next web app?
Report issues to make it better.
Submit ideas to get new amazing features.

w:HTMLPanel.p: All your feedback is really precious and will be given careful consideration.
